EmailTemplate.description: Sending requesters a notification that the case request was received by Legal Team
EmailTemplate.name: Request Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Your legal request was received for Account: {!Case.Account}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.CreatedBy},
We received your case request for {!Account.Name}.
Your case has been assigned to {!Case.OwnerFullName}, We will contact you if we have any questions.
To view {!Case.CaseNumber}, please click the link below
{!Case.Link}
Thank you,
FMS Law Department
